Source: MEM1 (part of Mem-alpha)
Original Path: /mnt/pfs-guan-ssai/nlu/zhangkehao/Mem-alpha/MEM1/Mem1/inference/
Copied Date: 2025-12-04

Included:
- inference/ (complete directory with all Python files)
  - data_pipelines.py (Mem1Pipeline class)
  - models.py (model handling)
  - eval.py (evaluation utilities)
  - generate_rollout.py (generation utilities)
  - start_vllm.sh (vllm startup script)
  - __init__.py, README.md

Excluded:
- Other MEM1 directories (only inference/ is needed)

Notes:
- Used by mem1_agent.py wrapper
- Requires VLLM server for inference
